answers.answer: I would recommend seeing your Dr. Have your testosterone and prostate checked. What med are you on for the diabetes? Some of them can have this side effect. Did you have this problem before or after starting the insulin?

question: Hi  I am 65 and have always had a good sex life although I on my own right now. I am currently unable to maintain an erection either when masturbating or when Im with a casual partner. Sometimes , when I orgasm I dont produce sperm and other times very little On the occasion I manage to climax with a strong erection and then produce sperm as if I were in my teens ! I take drugs orally for type 2 diabetis and have a small kidney stone. What can you suggest as I do enjoy the company of women and feel worthless when I cant rise to the occasion.  Doug
title: Mr Softie
